w2:span.label: 프로웍스/웹스퀘어 연계 샘플
w2:span.style: font-weight: bold;font-family: Malgun Gothic, 맑은 고딕, arial, mgw, Verdana, dotum, Sans-serif;font-size:16pt;vertical-align: middle;

w2:anchor.style: background-color: #FFFFFF;display: inline-block;font-weight: bold;border-radius: 5px;outline: none;text-align: center;vertical-align: middle;color: #747474;border: 1px solid rgb(42, 100, 177);height: 10px;padding-top: 8px;padding-bottom: 8px;width: 70px;line-height: 12px;text-decoration: none;float: right;margin-left: 10px;
w2:anchor.xf:label: 로그아웃

w2:span.label: 접속시간 :
w2:span.style: color:#000000;float: left;margin-left: 15px;margin-top: 15px;margin-right: 10px;font-weight:bold;font-family: Malgun Gothic, 맑은 고딕, arial, mgw, Verdana, dotum, Sans-serif;

w2:span.label: #SERVER_TIME#
w2:span.style: color:#000000;float: left;margin-top: 15px;margin-right: 20px;font-family: Malgun Gothic, 맑은 고딕, arial, mgw, Verdana, dotum, Sans-serif;

w2:span.label: 접속자명 :
w2:span.style: color:#000000;float: left;margin-top: 15px;margin-right: 10px;font-weight:bold;font-family: Malgun Gothic, 맑은 고딕, arial, mgw, Verdana, dotum, Sans-serif;

w2:span.label: #USER_NAME#
w2:span.style: color:#000000;float: left;margin-top: 15px;margin-right: 10px;font-family: Malgun Gothic, 맑은 고딕, arial, mgw, Verdana, dotum, Sans-serif;

xf:group.style: border: 1px solid #d7d7d8;border-spacing: 0;border-top: 2px solid #737272;border-left: 1px hidden #fff;border-right: 1px hidden #fff;border-bottom: 1px solid #858585;background: #f1f1f1;padding: 10px;overflow: hidden;margin-bottom: 28px;

xf:trigger.style: width: 70px;height: 24px;color: #FFFFFF;display: inline-block;padding: 0 14px 0px;line-height: 22px;font-size: 13px;font-weight: bold;color: #fff;border: 1px solid #000001;background: #3b4b62;vertical-align: middle;box-sizing: border-box;
xf:trigger.xf:label: 검색

xf:trigger.style: width: 70px;height: 24px;display: inline-block;padding: 0 14px 0px;line-height: 22px;font-size: 13px;color: #747474;font-weight: bold;border: 1px solid #ccd3d5;background: #fff;vertical-align: middle;box-sizing: border-box;
xf:trigger.xf:label: 초기화

xf:trigger.style: width: 60px;height: 24px;margin-left: 3px;display: inline-block;padding: 0 14px 0px;line-height: 22px;font-size: 13px;color: #747474;font-weight: bold;border: 1px solid #ccd3d5;background: #fff;vertical-align: middle;box-sizing: border-box;
xf:trigger.xf:label: 저장

xf:trigger.style: width: 60px;height: 24px;margin-left: 3px;display: inline-block;padding: 0 14px 0px;line-height: 22px;font-size: 13px;color: #747474;font-weight: bold;border: 1px solid #ccd3d5;background: #fff;vertical-align: middle;box-sizing: border-box;display: none;
xf:trigger.xf:label: 수정

xf:trigger.style: width: 60px;height: 24px;margin-left: 3px;display: inline-block;padding: 0 14px 0px;line-height: 22px;font-size: 13px;color: #747474;font-weight: bold;border: 1px solid #ccd3d5;background: #fff;vertical-align: middle;box-sizing: border-box;display: none;
xf:trigger.xf:label: 삭제

xf:group.style: width:100%;border-spacing: 0;border-top: 2px solid #1997c0;border-left: 1px hidden #fff;border-right: 1px hidden #fff; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585;
